Package orego.mcts

Player classes implementing Monte-Carlo tree search.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Lgrf2Player
    The last-good-reply (with forgetting) player, responding to two moves.
    LgrfMcRunnable
    McRunnable that uses LGRF2 (Last Good Reply with Forgetting, level 2) to generate moves.
    McPlayer
    A Monte-Carlo player.
    McRunnable
    Players use this class to perform multiple Monte Carlo runs in different threads.
    MctsPlayer
    Monte-Carlo tree search player, using the UCT algorithm.
    RaveCovPlayer  
    RaveDynamicBiasPlayer  
    RaveNode  
    RavePlayer
    A player using the RAVE improvement on UCT.
    SearchNode
    A node in the search tree / transposition table.
    TranspositionTable
    A hash table of nodes representing board configurations.
    WLSMcRunnable  
    WLSPlayer
    A simple extension to RavePlayer which maintains a list of best replies to a given move.
    WLSResponseMoveList
    Simple container object which manages a list of moves, their associated WLS states, and a list of top K moves from this list.

Package orego.mcts Description
